title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2024 to 2021.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2021 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
